subject: Western Union Money Agent
body:
Western Union Money Agent
FAST, RELIABLE, WORLDWIDE MONEY TRANSFER
2nd Avenue 21 Road, Festac Town,
Lagos-Nigeria
Tel: (+234) 90-6011-5803----- Direct number
For Your Payment Valued US$1,200,000.00
This is the second time perhaps the last email notification to you as i have been trying to get you on telephone regarding your long Approved US$1,200,000.00 but the line was not going through however One (Mr. Thomas Parker) visited my office yesterday along a Nigerian Legal Attorney with an Application Letter of claim over your compensation sum of US$1,200,000.00 with this financial institution.
Please, Do confirm to me as matter of urgency if this Canadian man is really your representative so that this office will not be held responsible for paying wrong person based on the Board of Directors meeting today they have given him the first western union remittance of US$5,500 with the Money Transfer Control Number as thus (292-035-9986) in his favor since you failed to respond to the earlier message.
Note, If you have not sent Mr. Thomas Parker to receive this funds on your name behalf and you are really serious and willing to claim your payment through western union kindly get back to me and i will work with you to complete the western union payment process so that you will start receiving your daily transfer of UD$5,500 per day to the total Approved sum of US$1,200,000.00.
Therefore, Upon hearing from you and as an insider in this Financial Institution i will now be under legal obligation to co-operate with you to retrieve this legacy payment left behind than allowing the Government of this Country to confiscate it because i believed it is a life time opportunity which every reasonable human-being will never allow to slip by, We do business each day with an absolute commitment to Ethics, Honesty and Credibility.
Awaiting for your urgent and immediate responses to enable the Western Union Audit Account Department program a new Money Transfer Control Number (M.T.C.N) of US$5,500 in your name favor, Thank you.
Yours Faithfully,
Mr. Roland Jones
2nd Avenue 21 Road, Festac Town,
Lagos-Nigeria
Tel: (+234) 90-6011-5803----- Direct number

subject: Re:   Western Union Money Agent
body:
Hello Mr. Roland Jones,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, your message has left me a bit confused. I don't recall having any business with a Mr. Thomas Parker and I'm not sure why he would be claiming funds on my behalf.

Could you please provide more details about this approved sum of US? How did it come to be approved in my name? And what is the nature of this legacy payment?

I appreciate your commitment to ethics and honesty, and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Marina

subject: Detail information
body:
From Desk Of Mr.Roland Jones
Plot 21 Macpherson Close Victoria Island
Lagos

For Your Payment Valued US$ 1,578,900.75

Dear sir,

Thanks for your urgent quick reply which you are advised to provide your
following delivery details to enable us send the ATM Card to you because
the processing of the bank wire transfer into your nominated bank account
will take too long time and many paper documentation and to save all this
hurdles you will receive the fund by ATM Cash Card.

Please kindly re-confirm once more the request below to avoid mistake
during FedEx delivery.

1.Full Name:......................................................
2.Home or Office Address:.........................................
3.Mobile Telephone No:..............................................
4.ATTACH COPY OF YOUR IDENTIFICATION / If any available.

Upon the receipt of above requirement FedEx Courier company will carry out
the delivery and i will give you the Tracking Number/Airway Bill of the
shipment which the parcel must arrive your destination latest on Friday
being the 16th day of February 2024.Thank you,

Yours faithfully,

Mr.Roland Jones
Plot 21 Macpherson Close Victoria Island
Lagos

subject: Re: Detail information
body:
Hello Jones,

Thank you for your prompt response. It's great to hear that the process can be expedited through an ATM Cash Card. I'm always open to more efficient methods!

However, before we proceed, could you please provide me with some additional information? I would like to understand more about this process. For instance, how does the ATM Cash Card work? Is it similar to a regular debit card that I can use at any ATM?

Also, could you tell me more about the courier company that will be handling the delivery? It would be reassuring to know their name and track record.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Marina
